name: The Leak (ShadowBoi3000)
description:
A rhythm game made for the 2021 Ukie game jam where the theme is Water

Rules:
~Press the key that appears on the screen to stop the leak.
~Failure to press key will result in loss of water 
~Try to not miss any keys and survive for as long as possible

The main reason for taking part in the game jam was to meet like minded people in the same university and build connections with peers who we haven't met yet.

Progamming: Arnav Mehta
3D Art: Callum Roberts
Music,  Lighting and Materials: Dave Wescott
